title: The Gears of Fate Are Sadly Unhinged - Novel Updates
tags: Arrogant Characters   Childhood Friends   Childhood Love   Cruel Characters   Engagement   Female Protagonist   Forced into a Relationship   Love at First Sight   Nobles   Persistent Love Interests   Royalty   Short Story
author: Fujisaki Jiu   藤咲慈雨
description:
Lucia looked at the letter she had received and thought it was time to get ready.

It seems that her fiancé, the Prince, is returning to the royal castle with the woman who saved his life.

Lucia bit her lip hard, almost swallowed by a deep despair that this time has finally come for her too.

Apparently, there have been cases of fiancés meeting their “fate’s partner” and breaking off their engagements.

Lucia thought it was none of her business.

But never thought she would be a part of it.

“They are united by fate… Then what is the fate of our future?”>
